email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Can you confirm the laycan and provide the charter party agreement for review? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons, and the laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm once the vessel is fixed. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent news! The MV Ocean Star is now fixed for your cargo. I’ll send you the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah.
